content.text: Great! I'm just hanging out, playing with my cats and dog.
Oh nice! I have a black thumb when it comes to growing plants, but I'm determined to learn more about native plants and how to grow them in my garden.
That's awesome! I love playing with animals. I have a koi named Spot who always cheers me up.
What's it like living in France?
It's great! I love the food and the culture. I'm worried about my future after high school, but I'm trying to stay positive.
I'm sure you'll figure it out! I'm a musician and I'm proud of being able to make my passion a reality, even though I have a day job.
That's amazing! I love music. I would love to try some of your favorite types of sushi.
I would be happy to share! I'm vegan, so I don't eat meat, but there are a lot of great vegan sushi options.
That's awesome! I'm trying to eat healthier so I'll definitely have to try some of your vegan sushi recommendations!
